meta.title: Flipika - Google Ads Reports for Media Buyers
meta.description: Generate automated, clear, and professional Google Ads reports for your clients. The ideal solution for demanding media buyers.
meta.keywords: Google Ads Reports, Media Buyer, Automated Reporting, Google Ads Audit, PPC Freelancer, PPC Agency
meta.ogTitle: Flipika - Google Ads Reports for Media Buyers
meta.ogDescription: Generate automated, clear, and professional Google Ads reports for your clients.

hero.title: Google Ads Reports: From 3h to 2 min.
hero.subtitle: Auto-generated. Visually validated. Sent in one click.
hero.description: Flipika connects to your Google Ads accounts, generates client reports, and submits them for your review. You check, you send. Zero formatting, zero stress.

problem.title: Google Ads Reporting is Killing Your Productivity
problem.subtitle: Hours wasted on repetitive tasks
problem.description: Between exports, dashboards, and explaining performance, client reporting becomes a recurring chore.

issues.difficultToScale: Impossible to scale with this process
issues.expensiveAgency: Clients who don't read your reports

aiGeneration.title: Ready-to-use Templates
aiGeneration.description: Pick a template, select the Google Ads account and campaigns: your report is ready. Never format manually again.

analytics.title: One Theme Per Client
analytics.description: Set colors, logo and typography for each client. The theme applies automatically to all their reports. Professionalism guaranteed.

optimization.title: Flipika AI Analyzes Your Data
optimization.description: Our AI automatically generates relevant insights: trends, anomalies, recommendations. Your clients finally understand their performance.

createCampaigns.title: Widgets Connected to Google Ads
createCampaigns.subtitle: Real-time data, auto-synced
createCampaigns.description: Our widgets pull directly from your clients' Google Ads accounts. Impressions, clicks, conversions, ROAS: everything syncs automatically.

autoOptimize.title: Narrative Layer: Contextual Comments
autoOptimize.subtitle: Numbers with meaning
autoOptimize.description: Add your analysis and explanations directly in the report. Your expertise brings the real value to the client.

actionableInsights.title: Smart Scheduling
actionableInsights.subtitle: Auto-prepared, validated by you
actionableInsights.description: Your reports are generated on schedule and wait for your approval. One glance, one click, sent. You keep final control.

whiteLabelPortal.title: Built-in Pre-Flight Check
whiteLabelPortal.subtitle: Zero mistakes, zero stress
whiteLabelPortal.description: Before every send, visually validate: right client, right logo, right data. Password-protected viewing or PDF export. GDPR compliant.

dataSnapshots.title: Frozen Data Snapshots
dataSnapshots.subtitle: Your reports remain immutable
dataSnapshots.description: Data is "frozen" when the report is finalized. January's report will stay identical, even when viewed in December.

differentiation.title: Why Media Buyers use Flipika
differentiation.subtitle: Built for Google Ads client reporting
differentiation.description: Flipika simplifies your reporting workflow without replacing your expertise.

notCopywritingTool.title: Not another dashboard
notCopywritingTool.subtitle: A real client reporting tool
notCopywritingTool.description: Flipika transforms your Google Ads data into understandable and actionable reports.

designedForMediaBuyers.title: Designed for Media Buyers
designedForMediaBuyers.subtitle: Freelancers and agencies
designedForMediaBuyers.description: Every feature is designed to save time on reporting.

usesRealData.title: Real Google Ads data

subscription.title: Subscription Required

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
Flipika ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect personal data and Google Ads data from our users.

Our service: Flipika is a Google Ads campaign management and analysis platform that allows users to visualize the performance of their advertising campaigns.

whoWeAre.title: 2. Who we are
whoWeAre.content: The controller of your personal data is:
whoWeAre.address: Headquarters: 1 rue de Stockholm, 75008 Paris, France

dataCollected.title: 2. Data collected
dataCollected.intro: We request access to Google data in two steps:
step1List: userinfo.email: Your Google account primary email address
userinfo.profile: Name, profile picture, and public information
dataCollected.step2Title: Step 2 - Google Ads Account Connection (only when user chooses to connect their Google Ads account):
step2List: auth/adwords: Read access to your Google Ads campaign data (impressions, clicks, costs, ROI, ad creatives)
usageDataList: Login and activity logs on the platform
Technical data (IP address, browser, operating system)

dataUsage.title: 3. Data usage
dataUsage.googleAdsIntro: We use Google Ads data exclusively to:
googleAdsList: Display performance reports: visualization of metrics (impressions, clicks, CTR, CPC, conversions, costs)
Generate analytical dashboards: custom charts and statistics for the user
Enable campaign navigation: view Google Ads account structure
notDoingList: ❌ Automatically modify, create, or delete advertising campaigns
❌ Use your data for external marketing purposes
❌ Resell or transfer your data to third parties
❌ Train AI models with your data (feature not implemented)
userDataList: profile: User interface personalization (display of name and profile picture)

dataSharing.title: 4. Data sharing with third parties
dataSharing.noSharingContent:
All your data is stored internally on our Google Cloud Platform (Firebase/Firestore) servers located in the European Union.

Flipika does not share, transfer, or disclose your Google Ads data to external third parties.

Your Google data (email, profile, Google Ads data) is used exclusively within our service and is never:
neverList: Sold to advertisers or data brokers
Transferred to other applications or services
dataSharing.serviceProvidersIntro: We use service providers acting on our behalf, under strict confidentiality agreements:
serviceProvidersList: Google Cloud Platform / Firebase: Infrastructure hosting, database (Firestore). Data stored encrypted. SOC 2/3, ISO 27001 compliance.
Google Analytics: Platform usage analysis (anonymized). Anonymized usage statistics, no Google Ads data. GDPR compliance.
commitmentsList: Access limited to strictly necessary data
Prohibition from using data for their own purposes
Compliance with security standards (encryption, access controls)
dataSharing.legalObligationsIntro: We may disclose data only in the following cases:
legalObligationsList: In response to a valid legal request (subpoena, court order)
To protect the rights, property, or safety of Flipika, our users, or the public
In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets (with prior notice to users)

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data protection mechanisms
technicalList: Encryption in transit (TLS 1.3 / SSL): All communications between your browser and our servers are encrypted
Encryption at rest (AES-256): Data stored in Firebase Firestore is encrypted
Secure authentication (OAuth 2.0): Google standard protocol, no Flipika password stored
Access tokens: OAuth tokens are stored encrypted and automatically expired
Limited access: Principle of least privilege - only strictly necessary permissions are requested
Data isolation: Each user's data is isolated (no cross-access)
organizationalList: Restricted access: Only authorized employees (technical team) can access infrastructures
Logging: All accesses to sensitive data are logged and audited
Security reviews: Regular audits of code and infrastructure
Staff training: All employees are trained in privacy best practices
Security policy: Strict internal procedures for data management
accessControlsList: Regular rotation of API keys and secrets
Automatic alerts in case of anomaly

dataRetention.title: 6. Data retention
durationList: Google Ads data: As long as the account is active (necessary to display historical reports)
Profile data (email, name): As long as the account is active (necessary for authentication and communication)
dataRetention.deletionIntro: You can request deletion of your data at any time:
deletionList: Google Ads account disconnection: Revokes access to your advertising data (immediate token deletion, data retained for 30 days)
Flipika account deletion: Complete deletion of all your data within 30 days
Direct contact: Deletion request via helloflipika@gmail.com (response within 48h)
dataRetention.autoDeletion: Automatic deletion: In case of inactivity for more than 24 months, we notify you before permanently deleting your data.

userRights.title: 7. User rights (GDPR)
userRights.intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
rightsList: Access: Obtain a copy of your data → Flipika Interface > "Export my data" or helloflipika@gmail.com
Rectification: Correct inaccurate data → Flipika Interface > "Account settings"
Deletion: Request erasure of your data → Flipika Interface > "Delete my account" or helloflipika@gmail.com
Restriction: Restrict processing of your data → helloflipika@gmail.com
Portability: Retrieve your data in a structured format → Flipika Interface > "Export my data" (JSON format)
Objection: Object to the processing of your data → Google Ads account disconnection or account deletion
Consent withdrawal: Revoke your OAuth consent → Google Account > "Third-party apps access" > Revoke Flipika
userRights.responseTime: Response time: We commit to responding to any request within a maximum of 30 days.

googleCompliance.title: 8. Compliance with Google Rules
commitmentList: Google API Services User Data Policy
Google Ads API Terms and Conditions
Google API Terms of Service
googleCompliance.limitedUseIntro: In accordance with the Limited Use policy of Google API Services user data, we guarantee that:
limitedUseList: Data limitation: We only request scopes strictly necessary to provide our service
Transparent usage: Google data is used only for features visible to the user (reports, dashboards)
No transfer: Data is not transferred to third parties (except contractual subprocessors)
No advertising use: Google data is not used to serve advertisements
scopeJustificationList: auth/adwords: Read-only access to Google Ads data to display performance reports (impressions, clicks, costs, ROI). No automatic modification is performed without explicit user action.

cookies.title: 9. Cookies and tracking technologies
usedList: Session cookies: Maintain user session (deleted upon browser closure)
Google Analytics: Anonymized platform usage analysis (opt-out possible via Google Consent Mode)
cookies.configuration: Configuration: We use Google Consent Mode v2 with default denial of advertising and analytics cookies until your consent.
cookies.management: You can refuse analytics cookies in your browser settings or via our consent banner.

internationalTransfers.title: 10. International data transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Data is hosted on Google Cloud Platform (Firebase) in the europe-west1 (Belgium) region.
internationalTransfers.guaranteesIntro: In case of transfer outside the European Union (for redundancy or performance reasons), we guarantee:
guaranteesList: Use of standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission
Compliance with European Commission adequacy decisions

minorProtection.title: 11. Protection of minors
minorProtection.content: Flipika is not intended for persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you notice that a minor has created an account, please contact us immediately at helloflipika@gmail.com.

policyChanges.title: 12. Changes to this policy
policyChanges.intro: We may update this privacy policy periodically. In case of substantial modification:
changesList: Display of a notification in the Flipika interface
Update of the "Last updated" date at the top of this document
policyChanges.archivedVersions: Archived version: Previous versions of this policy are available upon request.

contact.title: 13. Contact and Supervisory Authority
contact.contactUsIntro: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your data:
contact.address: Address: Flipika SAS, 1 rue de Stockholm, 75008 Paris, France
contact.authorityIntro: You have the right to file a complaint with the competent supervisory authority:
contact.cnilName: CNIL (Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertés)
contact.cnilAddress: 3 Place de Fontenoy, TSA 80715, 75334 Paris Cedex 07
